name: To Hell And Back!
description:
NOTICE: THE GAME CAN BE SLOW ASF IN A BROWSER SO I GREATLY RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING IT AND RUNNING IT NATIVELY !!!

This game is made for the Godot Wild Jam #45.

Theme - Underground

WildCards used - Next & Breathtaking (hopefully lol, maybe not in a good way)

This game is an endless, procedurally-generated runner, the main catch of this game is that you can switch worlds, between heaven and hell. I figured the hell part would be the thing that fits the Underground theme.

HOW TO PLAY

 - Jump with Space, the longer you hold it, the further you jump.

 - When a goon spawns, left click on it to damage it while it's floating around, there are 3 variations of goons in total.

 - The little portals that occasionally spawn will transport you to the opposite parallel world, among touching it.

 - You can break through blocks at the expense of losing half a life, but you also get about a second of immunity, be wise with that. One block that spawns in hell, you can also break, but it will instantly kill you.

CREDITS

 - Art: me

 - Sound effects: me

 - Font: https://www.dafont.com/arcade-classic-2.font

 - Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/retro-platforming/45...
